ComicInfo.Title: Season 2
ComicInfo.Series: Edgar Allan Poe's Snifter of Terror, Season Two
ComicInfo.Summary:
Ever wonder how "The Raven" got into Poe's study on that midnight dreary? Writer/artist Linda Medley (Castle Waiting, Doom Patrol) tells all! PLUS! Planet of the Nerds' Paul Constant and Alan Robinson expose the CIA connection to "The Pit and the Pendulum!" EXTRA! Hunt Emerson's "Poe and The Black Cat" continues on its gory way! Plus prose stories! Painted cover by Richard Williams (MAD).
Story TitlesThe Pit and the PendulumThe RavenGod of A Different RoachAn Oral History of the Tucson Trivia Robot RiotPoe and the Black Cat
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-08 23:16:49. [CVDB731434]
ComicInfo.Writer: Bryce Ingman, Hunt Emerson, Linda Medley, Paul Constant, Robert Jeschonek
ComicInfo.Penciller: Alan Robinson, Brian Dunphy, Ed Catto, Hunt Emerson, Linda Medley, Alan Robinson, Brian Dunphy, Ed Catto, Hunt Emerson, Linda Medley
ComicInfo.Inker: Alan Robinson, Brian Dunphy, Ed Catto, Hunt Emerson, Linda Medley, Alan Robinson, Brian Dunphy, Ed Catto, Hunt Emerson, Linda Medley
ComicInfo.Characters: Edgar Allan Poe, Pluto, The Raven
ComicInfo.Locations: Angola, Ann Arbor, London Heathrow Airport, Richmond, Virginia
